Simha & Sarwa Associates

Judicial Insight. Strategic Advocacy.

Welcome to the digital gateway of Simha & Sarwa Associates, a full-service law firm based in Hyderabad. Founded by former members of the judiciary, our firm is built on the belief that effective legal representation requires a deep understanding of both the letter of the law and the mechanics of judicial decision-making.

We advise clients on legal, regulatory, and procedural aspects of matters before courts, tribunals, and other authorities in India. Our practice is guided by professional standards, ethical obligations, and applicable laws.

docs.title: The Judicial Advantage: An Inside-Out Perspective
docs.text:
Most legal strategies are built on how to present a case. At Simha & Sarwa Associates, our strategies are built on how a case is decided.

Having served as Civil Judges and Magistrates, our founding partners have spent years behind the bench, analyzing thousands of arguments and rendering judgments. This transition from the judiciary to private practice provides our clients with three distinct advantages:

1. Anticipating the Bench

Because we have written judgments ourselves, we understand the specific nuances that influence a court's decision. We don't just prepare a case; we prepare it to meet the exact standards of scrutiny used by the presiding officer. We anticipate the questions a judge will ask before they are ever voiced.

2. Mastery of Procedural Rigor

In the Indian legal system, many cases are won or lost on procedural technicalities—especially in Real Estate and Criminal Litigation. Our experience in the judiciary ensures that every filing, every piece of evidence, and every stage of the trial is handled with "procedural exactitude," minimizing delays and maximizing technical merit.

3. Realistic Case Assessment

We provide our clients with an unvarnished view of their legal standing. Our judicial background allows us to strip away the noise of a dispute and focus on the "evidentiary appreciation" that truly matters. This leads to more efficient resolutions and strategic realism in settlement negotiations or trial preparation.

docs.title: People
docs.text:
Ankit Sarwa

Founding Partner

Ankit S. is a founding partner at Simha & Sarwa Associates, bringing a rare depth of insight to the firm’s litigation and advisory practices. His career is defined by a distinguished transition from the judiciary to private practice, providing clients with a strategic advantage rooted in first-hand adjudicatory experience.

From 2021 to 2025, Ankit served as a Judge in the Telangana Judiciary, presiding over matters in Hyderabad and Rangareddy. This tenure allowed him to master the nuances of legal interpretation and courtroom strategy from the perspective of the bench. Prior to his judicial service, he honed his skills in high-stakes litigation at Dua Associates, Bangalore.

An academic standout, Ankit holds a B.A. LL.B (Hons.) from the Rajiv Gandhi National University of Law, Patiala. He further specialized at the Indian Law Institute, New Delhi, where he graduated as the Batch Topper and Gold Medalist (LL.M). Today, he leverages this rigorous academic foundation and judicial background to lead the firm’s focus on dispute resolution, real estate, corporate law, and complex civil and criminal matters.

He regularly appears before High Courts in India and has advised domestic and international clients across multiple sectors.

Keerthi Simha

Founding Partner

Keerthi Simha is a Founding Partner at Simha & Sarwa Associates, where he integrates a decade of substantive experience within the justice delivery system into strategic legal practice. His unique perspective is shaped by his tenure as a Civil Judge and Magistrate, a role that provided him with an "inside-out" understanding of judicial decision-making, evidentiary appreciation, and procedural rigor.

A scholar-practitioner, Keerthi is an alumnus of the prestigious NALSAR University of Law, where he earned his B.A., LL.B. (Hons) and is currently pursuing his Ph.D. This enduring engagement with legal scholarship allows him to bridge the gap between complex legal doctrine and courtroom realism.

At Simha & Sarwa Associates, Keerthi leads a practice distinguished by analytical depth and intellectual integrity. His work spans civil disputes, criminal litigation, real estate law, and arbitration, offering clients a composed, resolution-centric mindset. He is dedicated to building a practice rooted in long-term legal guardianship and unwavering ethical standards.

docs.title: Our Philosophy: The Resolution-Centric Mindset
docs.text:
At Simha & Sarwa Associates, we do not view litigation as an end in itself. We view it as one of many tools used to achieve a definitive, sustainable resolution. Our philosophy is rooted in the transition from the impartiality of the bench to the strategic commitment of advocacy.

Clarity Over Conflict

Legal disputes are often clouded by procedural noise and emotional escalation. Our first priority is to provide clarity of thought. By stripping a case down to its core legal and factual merits, we help our clients see the most direct path to a conclusion, whether that is through aggressive litigation, strategic settlement, or alternative dispute resolution.

Intellectual Integrity

We believe that the most persuasive advocacy is grounded in doctrinal depth. Our work is characterized by a "scholar-practitioner" approach—leveraging high-level academic research and a deep respect for jurisprudence to build arguments that are not only compelling but legally resilient.

Principled Advocacy

Our time in the judiciary has instilled in us an uncompromising commitment to procedural exactitude and ethical standards. We represent our clients with the same rigor and respect for the law that we expected from the advocates who appeared before us. To us, credibility is the most valuable asset a lawyer can bring to the courtroom.

Long-Term Guardianship

We do not just manage cases; we manage relationships. Our goal is to serve as long-term legal guardians for our clients, providing a composed and stable presence in the face of complex legal challenges. We measure our success not just by the results we achieve, but by the credibility and peace of mind we provide to those we represent.
